whom we remember from the drop-car at our opening ... Atley walks with a LIMP now... Thunk! Thunk! Thunk!

Car-jacker. Neglected to clean up after himself ...

We can learn something from our Asian friends. They smoke a thousand cigarettes a day; they're completely stressed and overworked; they drink like, well ...

of G.R.A.B. The Governor's Regional Auto-theft Bureau. Castlebeck is mid-50s, black, saturnine. - But don't let the tacit nobility fool you - the man's a street viper ...

My point. Yes. Simple, really. I require the best. I insist on the best. I only engage the best.  Your brother. His friends. They came to me. They wanted my paper. He was your brother. Grow up. You don't kill people like me.

No, no. You don't kill me, because you can't. You don't take your brother and run, because we'd find him. You don't go to the-police, because we have friends there, too. You do nothing: except deal with me.

Go to them. They'll be happy to see you ... Ahhh...
This cannot be successfully carried out without baby brother's considerable resources, shabby though they may be.
In order to succeed, you're going to have to go old-school. one night boost. Put all your nuts in one basket.
We're on a truncated time-table. Take a day to shop it; a day to prep it ... And we're still going to need to expand the crew...
We've got several Italian cars on the list.
No faith in our new-found goodness, Detective ...?
We're dinosaurs, Donny. Pull-up a tar pit ...
He never says a word. And he's got a messed-up nose. Hence. The Sphinx.
Yes, I do, in fact. John Wayne in McO...
Yes, but what was on the license plate?
Very good. But what was the significance of "ROBIN 1"?
His first name was Thomas. Thomas Magnum...
Anyone? The significance of "Robin 1" on Magnum's license plate? Memphis?
Ten points for our fearless leader ...
To a safe and successful session of bumping fenders and trading paint.
So saith the God of Scumbags --
Getting nervous, Ray? What happens to you, I wonder, if delivery isn't made?
Ready to start erasing. Good luck, kiddies --
"Carol." A 198 Mercedes ... She lives in the suburbs ...
It's ear-marked for Mirror Man and The Sphinx...
He's gonna be okay. Could do a bit.
Dinosaurs. All of us. The Ice Age is now...
... that's right. They'll be in the lobby of the Riviera Building. 2206 Beacon Street. Palos Verdes ...
Pull over! Pull her the hell over!
Put it in PARK. Remember how to do that? It's the big "Pff.
"Objects May Appear Closer Than They Seem." Can you say that for me?
You ain't sorry. You're a horrible driver... You can't strap into your seat belt, without almost getting creamed by a bus ...
Aw, c'mon. It's no big deal.
All I get are the Orientals. They can build 'em, but they can't drive 'em So? What are you doing here?

Most of 'em are gone. The Dyar Boys are doing a nickel at Chino; Henry Santoro and Frankie Fish are moving weight in Florida; Bill Doolin was killed in Denver... Atley Jackson's on the gimp and runnin' errands for Calitri; The Sphinx is still around, I guess ... Then of course, there's ...
Okay. Figure it forgotten. What's this about anyways -- ?
We'll have to start beating the bushes, find out where they live...
A bunch of strung-out hypes and stick-
You guys have any skills at all?
We sent him out on a solo boost. See what he could do ...
Well, that defies the point, don't it?
Get the damn thing in there and get it cleaned up -
There's gotta be a million bucks worth here -
Jesus. The whole damn thing's loaded.
Car-jacking is the lazy man's boost.
Fabled creature. You know - the horse with the horn? Impossible to capture?
We all got one. The single car that, no matter how many times you try to boost, something happens...
You'll get the hang of it, kid. You just need to remember one thing -
On boost night? Always take along a good mix tape ...
You bring a woman back to your crib for some lovemaking, the song you put on, depends on the woman, the type of lovemaking you intend to do, right?

You got a school teacher or Nancy from accounting, you don't put on Sly Stone or James Brown. You put on Ravel. Rachmaninoff. But if you got some wild one you just picked up at the track, you wouldn't put on Cat Stevens or James Taylor.

It's the same way with cars. Different cars. Different tunes. You can't steal a Maserati listening to Sinatra. You gotta get urgent. You gotta get Sonny Rollins or Led Zeppelin IV, on that shit. But never, never-ever take no Allman Brothers into a Lincoln Town Car. Could lead to disaster. Got it... ?
Whoa, whoa, whoa. Memphis went out and got some big game ... Hello, Sway.
What do you think about all this?
Well, well, well. The original crash test dummy...
Check it out: 173 Firebird. Know who drove one of those ... ?
You ever notice how it had a different interior every week? That bugged me.
I'd like the names and addresses of the owners of these 20 cars please...
Thomas Sullivan Magnum, to be exact.
Walked like a bastard... Skippin' stones and shit..
Very good. Think you can get in without waking her up -- ?
That's an after-market alarm. Can't just cut her wires ...
I don't care what kind of car it is. How fancy; how expensive; how new. You pop the collar -
So? Tell me: how come they call you "Freb" anyways -- ?
Glad to know you, "Freberick." Let's roll -
Of course not. I'm Robin Hood. I take from the rich, and give to the needy...
No. The needy. Us. Cos we need this car!
I'm stealing this car. So BACK OFF!
Lazy, disrespectinIf half-assed bully. Any asshole can pull a gun ...
You don't know how to steal a car, do ya? So you gotta take them when there's already a key in them ... And a person in them...
Lazy ... Lazy ... I ask you, Freb: what's the matter with kids today?
Get outta here. Get out. Now!
I'm all right. Been shot before. You take me to the hospital, they bust the both of us. The cops'll take me. Go!
Take Laura with you, you stupid shit!
Enough? I haven't even started, girl.
I think you've had enough, Billy...
If you leave now, Billy, you can get a head-start on waking up in a pool of your own vomit...
Come back when you've learned how to drink, Billy --
You look like you lost your sheep ...
Hell, yeah. I'm not getting rich in here ...
Nope. I got a coffee. And a boyfriend.
No. You were replaced by Alex.
Yeah, well, you always were a sucker for flawed existences ...
No can do. Life goes on, pointfive ...
Yes. But I got a feeling it's not on account of any longing-for-my-touch on your part -
I'm not doing it anymore. Haven't for a while. I've carved out something for myself. It's pathetic, but it's mine ...
What the hell are you doing -- ?
Janis Joplin. Billie Holliday. Ella Fitzgerald...
Stick it in the drawer marked "Fool's Errand", right -- ?
No questions. I'm here. I need the dough.
How about: a Corvette in MAGICIAN; a Ford pick-up truck in INCREDIZLE HULK, and...
... he walked in THE COURTSHIP OF EDDIE'S FATHER.
The right side of the engine is running richer than the left. And the scope isn't showing shit... I dunno...
137 Roadster. Custom. Lives at 1443 Locklin in Rancho Palos Verdes ...
She was the only "Annie" you could find?
Yeah, well ... She lives with District Court Judge Seymour Croft ...
... and he keeps "Annie' in his living room... Like a work of art ...
She's got 27 miles on her o-dom.
We were good when you bailed, weren't we?
Cos there were those dark days, when I figured - my God, how easy it was for him to just give it up; to make the deal; take the rot for the whole crew ...

Don't go getting all warm and fuzzy on me, Randall. I'm the jane that was left, and you're the jim that did the leaving. So save the sanctimonious shit for someone who believes. The only reason I ride with you, is cause I don't want to spend the whole night with any of them other creeps!
No whistles, but a Club You bring a hack -- ?
She was so great, why'd you leave her?
I think so... They're just... So ...
It's 1:30 on a Tuesday. Is that any time to pick a girl up for a date?
You remember my Gramma? Yeah. I was thinking. If she were alive. And she asked me. If she came down, right now.

But ... That said... Car thieves are my weakness ... It's all so terribly Loretta Lynn or something, I know... But ... I don't wanna be a thief anymore ... I don't wanna love a thief anymore ... I want to wear a dress maybe once in a while... Maybe have a kid... Watch a lot of Audrey Hepburn movies.. And think about my Gramma without also thinking "shame on me. Shame on me. Shame on me... "
Arright ... Enough ... I can't have you bellying up to my heart again, man, f you can't help falling off the stool.
They're factory alarms ... Easy to get around... For a man with... Skills...
Of course you are. You're a professional...
I bet you say that to all the girls...
You're still quite the boost, Randall Raines ...
Except now I've been chopped, and my parts are in a Honda Prelude being driven to church in South America by some Bolivian consulate's wife ...
I can't. I got a back load of repairs and one of the mechanics called in sick and I haven't slept and--
Nothing. Just that if I was less secure, I might think you were more into Eleanor than you are me...
You should her face when she's having sex --
329 HRO. There's no want on the license at this time...
We have suspect vehicle matching description at the Woodburn Scrap and Metal ... Repeat: the suspect vehicle has just been apprehended at the Woodburn Scrap and Metal, 190 Street and Campanza ...
License is California 6-1-4 HSO. Repeat: California. 6-1-4 Henry Sam Ocean.
It's two dollars per car. That'll be 40 dollars please...
"Well, I'm not braggin,' babe So don't put me down But I got the fastest set of wheels in town, etc."
Oh, this is a good time --
It's a crime, ain't it? Cos Castlebeck's got a bug up his ass over this guy, I gotta get lung cancer ...
Let's see what these bastards are up to --

Yes, this is a message for Mr. Seymour Croft, of 1443 Locklin ... This is the Department of Water and Power and we're going to be doing some work in your area tonight ... If you'd please call us at 555-1877, so we could discuss the...
I got a message. I live at 1443 Locklin.
NO! No, I can't! I'm a busy man.
Okay, then ... I just go to the Marriott and I'm set ...

Out of the car, bitch, or I blow your fucking head off -- !
I'll shoot you fool... I'LL BLOW YOUR BRAINS OUT -- !

... Suspect is headed southbound on Mount Vernon, at Cambridge Street --

That is negative. Pursuit has not terminated. Repeat: not terminated.

Check that, all units. You guessed it.
All units. Suspect vehicle has left The Harbor Tunnel roadblock...
are chasing Memphis around the Plaza ...
where vehicle traffic ends. Foot traffic only ... Here com the cops... Memphis spins the wheel ... And he drives onto PUBLIC PARK...
Some guy's on the phone for you, Matty. Claims to be The Boss Barracuda ...

takes an exit ... And speeds on through the with everyone in pursuit ...
